snippet: Four Cuban major leaguers greeted by fans and members of the Cuban news media in the lobby of Havana’s Hotel Nacional at the start of the three-day visit.
abstract: Four Cuban baseball players who defected to join American major leagues are surrounded by fans and press as they arrive at Havana hotel to meet with family and friends on goodwill tour of country.
lead_paragraph: Four Cuban major leaguers greeted by fans and members of the Cuban news media in the lobby of Havana’s Hotel Nacional at the start of the three-day visit.

headline.main: Fans Swarm Four Players in Havana
headline.print_headline: Fans Swarm Four Players in Havana
